The Delta system was developed by NATO standards. If necessary, it can already be exchanged data with partners in real time.

About thisinformsMinistry of Defence Ukraine.

The department noted that thanks to this development of the Innovation Center, the Ministry of Defense plans operations and combat missions, exchange information on the placement of enemy forces in a protected space.

Delta is an ecosystem of military products that helps to destroy hostile objects daily. It includes a mobile application, a military messenger, a safe battlefield, a digital map, work planning and integration with other systems.

"Since Ukraine is the first in the world so actively fighting drones, the Ministry of Defense is working to integrate different types of drones into Delta," the department said.

The Defense Ministry also added that this will help to plan the use of drones - for example, which ones are best used to damage certain goals.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Ministry of Defense presented innovativeNATO Digitation Decision.
